entities.name: wizard
entities.description: A person who practices magic, introduced in the context of their relationship with wands.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: An object used by wizards to channel their magic, described as having a complex connection with its master.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: A person who was defeated by Harry and had his wand taken from him.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who took Draco's wand by force.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who handed his own wand to Ollivander for examination.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A person whose wand was taken by Ron.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: A wandmaker who examined the wands of Harry and Ron.

entities.name: peter pettigrew
entities.description: A person for whom Ollivander made a wand under duress.

relationships.description: The text describes a complex connection between wizards and their wands.
Harry took Draco's wand by force, indicating that Harry defeated Draco.
Ron handed Wormtail's wand to Ollivander for examination.
Harry asked Ollivander questions about wands.
Ron handed his wand to Ollivander for examination.
Ollivander made a wand for Peter Pettigrew under duress.
